com.fsc.cicerone.manager

Class ItineraryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fsc.cicerone.manager.ItineraryManager

  • public abstract class ItineraryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A control class that manages the itineraries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Itinerary uploadItinerary(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String bDate, java.lang.String eDate, java.lang.String rDate, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String duration, int repetitions, int minP, int maxP, float fPrice, float rPrice, java.lang.String url, AccountManager.BooleanRunnable result)
      Create and upload a new itinerary to the server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • uploadItinerary

        public static Itinerary uploadItinerary(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String description,
                                        java.lang.String bDate,
                                        java.lang.String eDate,
                                        java.lang.String rDate,
                                        java.lang.String location,
                                        java.lang.String duration,
                                        int repetitions,
                                        int minP,
                                        int maxP,
                                        float fPrice,
                                        float rPrice,
                                        java.lang.String url,
                                        AccountManager.BooleanRunnable result)
        Create and upload a new itinerary to the server.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the new itinerary.
        description - The description of the itinerary.
        bDate - The beginning date of the itinerary (format "yyyy-MM-dd").
        eDate - The ending date of the itinerary (format "yyyy-MM-dd").
        rDate - The reservation's ending date of the itinerary (format "yyyy-MM-dd").
        location - The location of the itinerary.
        duration - The duration of the itinerary.
        repetitions - The number of repetitions per day if the itinerary.
        minP - The minimum number of participants.
        maxP - The maximum number of participants.
        fPrice - The full price of the itinerary.
        rPrice - The reduced price of the itinerary.
        url - The URL of the image of the itinerary.
        Returns:
        The new itinerary.
